div.sent: There are many countries like ours in the world.
Just as there are children so there are also adults in these countries.
The language, culture and food habits of each are different.
But the fundamental requirement of all is the same.
All have the equal rights to enjoy these requirements.
This is called universal brotherhood.
If we maintain universal brotherhood, human qualities in all will be developed.
There will be understanding among.
All will help and cooperate one another.
There will be built friendship among all.
There will be peace in the world.

We will always try to build up universal brotherhood.
The countries surrounding ours are our neighbours.
Generally there are some common elements among the neighbours.
We often find that we can import from them the goods we do not produce.
Without mutual cooperation with neighbours economic development is hindered.
The peace and stability of the country are affected.
So the idea of regional cooperation has developed.
There are some countries in a particular region.
We live in the south of Asia.
The name of this region is South Asia.
Besides Bangladesh, there are India, Pakistan, Nepal, Bhutan, Sri Lanka, and Maldives in this region.
Shahid Ziaur Rahaman, the then President of Bangladesh, envisaged this organization.

The basic principle of SAARC is that any decision of the organization must be unanimous.
Regional integrity and sovereignty must be maintained.
No country will interfere in the political affairs of other countries.
Cooperation for mutual welfare is required.
